segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising to see her just standing there, not noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing on that stool, and it's really wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not even noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised no one has slipped on that wet floor yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, but the kids don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, she's missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really surprising to see such recklessness, but no one seems to mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on, it's quite a surprising scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
